title: Music Playback Engine
requirement:
Enable seamless streaming of millions of songs with high playback quality and support for diverse genres, catering to a global audience.

#### Screens:

- Home Screen: Show recommended and trending songs grouped by genre and region.
- Playback Screen: Display song details like album art, artist name, and playback controls (play/pause, skip, etc.).
#### Personas:

- Music Enthusiast: Listens to a variety of genres and artists worldwide.
- Casual Listener: Prefers accessing popular music easily without complexity.
